PLEASE REVIEW OUR TERMS OF USE AND PRIVACY POLICY CAREFULLY BEFORE DOWNLOADING OUR APPLICATION OR USING OUR SERVICE FOR THE FIRST TIME.

- These Terms of Use ("Terms") describe the terms and conditions upon which Clients ("You" or “Your” or “Yourself” or “User") access and use the Application (defined herein). 


 - These Terms govern the basis upon which Boro Service Provider ("Boro Service Provider” or the “Company") will allow you to access or use its Application, to connect with a third-party Partner who will provide you Mobility Services within the Territory. 


 - Your access to and use of the Application is subject to these Terms and applicable policies, as may be modified or updated by Boro Service Provider from time to time, and effective upon posting of updated Terms or/and applicable policies. 


 - Continued use of our Services after modification and update shall constitute your consent to such changes or modifications. 


 - These Terms expressly supersede prior agreements with you. Boro Service Provider may immediately terminate these Terms or any portion therein at any time without cause. 


 - Please ensure that you read and understand all of these Terms carefully before you use the Application or request our Mobility Services. 


 - By using or accessing the Application, you agree to be bound by these Terms. Your agreement to these Terms shall operate as a binding and legally enforceable agreement between you and Boro Service Provider in respects to the features on the Application and in relation to Boro Service Provider. 


 - If you do not agree with these Terms, do not use this Application or Mobility Services. 


 - You acknowledge and agree that Boro Service Provider is a technology service provider which acts as an intermediary between you and the Partner who provides Mobility Services as distinct from transportation services. Upon your execution (electronic or otherwise) of these Terms, you and Boro Service Provider shall be bound by details set forth herein. 


 - Boro Service Provider and You shall be individually referred to as “Party” and collectively as “Parties”.

"Subject to your compliance with these Terms, Boro Service Provider grants you a limited non-exclusive, non-sub licensee, revocable, non-transferable license to use the Application on your personal device, solely for your personal use. "

- "Harassment or misconduct refers to any unwanted conduct, contact or behavior undertaken by one Party toward another, whether sexual, physical or verbal, without explicit consent of the other person. 


- You are requested to not touch, behave inappropriately, or make inappropriate comments to your Partner while using the Mobility Service. 


- Examples or impropriety include nudges, whistles, winks, touches or flirting with the Partner. 


- Your contact with your Partner should end when the trip is completed. 


- If you find any reason to believe that the Partner is not behaving in an appropriate way, you may cancel the Mobility Service immediately and inform Boro Service Provider as soon as possible. "

Our mission at Boro Service Provider is to facilitate the freedom of mobility for all. When you use the services provided by Boro Service Provider (\" we\" or \" our\") including our application ( \"Apps\" ) that enable you to connect to our systems and obtain services (\" Platform\"), we collect, use and share some of your personal information. This Policy details the collection, use and disclosure of user information in connection with the Boro application. This Policy applies to all of our users/clients and partners (collectively \" you\", \" your\" or \" yours\"), and our Platform and services. All terms that have not been specifically defined herein shall have the same meaning as provided under the Terms of Use. This Privacy Policy should be read in conjunction with the Terms of Use as applicable to the Boro service(s) that you are using.
By using the Tootle application, you agree to provide consent to the collection, use and sharing of your personal information as described in this Policy.

When you use the Boro application, we collect and hold the information that you provide for our business purposes and functions: 


 Personal Information of User such as your name, gender, email address, phone number, and information about your device is collected when you use the Boro application. You may also opt to share additional information with us about your profile, including your photo, saved addresses, and other preferences. 


 Location Information: We collect information like your GPS location and IP address depending on whether you use our Platform as customer or a partner: 


 User Location Data: We collect data from our Users' mobile devices if they enable us to do so .

We use your personal information to: 

Display this information on our Platform Maintain the safety and security of our users (Customers, Partners and Drivers) Provide customer support Improve our Platform Comply with legal and statutory obligations Build and maintain the Boro community 


We also use your personal information to continually improve our Platform and provide you with the most efficient and superior user experience, possible. 


 Specifically, your information is used to: Verify your identity and maintain your account
